Introduction price!!!! Next version: 3.99!

Manga Reader HD provides thousand of free manga to your HP TouchPad. Read them online or download a whole manga for offline usage.

Included features:
- Beautiful user interface
- Featured Manga
- 2000+ manga!
- Auto background adjustment while reading a chapter
- Powerful manga filter
- Favorites system
- Random manga
- Download manager

Changelog 0.8.0 -> 0.8.7
[Add] Help / Preferences
[Add] Chapter indicator
[Add] Auto bookmark
[Add] Continue Reading
[Fix] Reader (scrolling/jump to page)
[Update] Background adjustment
[Update] Filter (Genre selection)

Next version:
- More manga
- Notification if a favored manga gets updated
- Download detection
